title: Sample Space
text: There are $$8$$ total areas where the arrow can land on.
speech: There are  8  total areas where the arrow can land on.
pacedSpeech: total areas where the arrow can land on.

title: Landing on Green
text: There are $$2$$ slices in the circle that the arrow can land on: the I and the F.
speech: There are  2  slices in the circle that the arrow can land on: the I and the F.
pacedSpeech: slices in the circle that the arrow can land on: the I and the F.

title: Complement Rule
text: We can simply subtract $$\frac{2}{8}$$ from $$1$$ to find the probability of not landing on green.
speech: We can simply subtract  2 eights  from  1,  to find the probability of not landing on green.
pacedSpeech: to find the probability of not landing on green.
